name: Inception
description: A mind-bending thriller where a skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an impossible heist.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces off against the Joker, a criminal mastermind intent on plunging Gotham into anarchy.

name: Forrest Gump
description: The extraordinary life story of Forrest Gump, a simple man with a big heart and limitless optimism.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: The story of a banker sentenced to life in Shawshank prison and his quest for freedom.

name: The Godfather
description: The saga of the Corleone crime family as they navigate power and loyalty.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

name: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who ruined his life.

name: Schindler's List
description: The true story of a businessman who saved the lives of more than a thousand Polish Jews during the Holocaust.

name: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrate their household.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to catch another serial killer.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The final battle for Middle-earth begins as Frodo and Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that spirals out of control.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in a series of vignettes.

name: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop a threat that could destroy the planet.
